Introduction to user interface functions

01_introduction.Rmd

Introduction to user functions

regemedint() 

library(regmedint)
library(tidyverse)
## Prepare dataset
vv2015 <- read_delim(file = "../tests/reference_results/data-valeri-vanderweele-2015.txt",
                     delim = " ") %>%
    ## Following R convention, an event indicator is used.
    mutate(event = if_else(cens == 0, 1L, 0L)) %>%
    select(-cens)

regmedint_obj <- regmedint(data = vv2015,
                           ## Variables
                           yvar = "y",
                           avar = "x",
                           mvar = "m",
                           cvar = c("c"),
                           eventvar = "event",
                           ## Values at which effects are evaluated
                           a0 = 0,
                           a1 = 1,
                           m_cde = 1,
                           c_cond = 0.5,
                           ## Model types
                           mreg = "logistic",
                           yreg = "survAFT_weibull",
                           ## Additional specification
                           interaction = TRUE,
                           casecontrol = FALSE)

print() for `regmedint

print(regmedint)
## function (data, yvar, avar, mvar, cvar, a0, a1, m_cde, c_cond, 
##     mreg, yreg, interaction = TRUE, casecontrol = FALSE, eventvar = NULL) 
## {
##     validate_args(data = data, yvar = yvar, avar = avar, mvar = mvar, 
##         cvar = cvar, a0 = a0, a1 = a1, m_cde = m_cde, c_cond = c_cond, 
##         mreg = mreg, yreg = yreg, interaction = interaction, 
##         casecontrol = casecontrol, eventvar = eventvar)
##     res <- new_regmedint(data = data, yvar = yvar, avar = avar, 
##         mvar = mvar, cvar = cvar, a0 = a0, a1 = a1, m_cde = m_cde, 
##         c_cond = c_cond, mreg = mreg, yreg = yreg, interaction = interaction, 
##         casecontrol = casecontrol, eventvar = eventvar)
##     validate_regmedint(res)
##     res
## }
## <bytecode: 0x7fb9f7bf2e40>
## <environment: namespace:regmedint>
print(regmedint, m_cde = 0, c_cond = 1)
## function (data, yvar, avar, mvar, cvar, a0, a1, m_cde, c_cond, 
##     mreg, yreg, interaction = TRUE, casecontrol = FALSE, eventvar = NULL) 
## {
##     validate_args(data = data, yvar = yvar, avar = avar, mvar = mvar, 
##         cvar = cvar, a0 = a0, a1 = a1, m_cde = m_cde, c_cond = c_cond, 
##         mreg = mreg, yreg = yreg, interaction = interaction, 
##         casecontrol = casecontrol, eventvar = eventvar)
##     res <- new_regmedint(data = data, yvar = yvar, avar = avar, 
##         mvar = mvar, cvar = cvar, a0 = a0, a1 = a1, m_cde = m_cde, 
##         c_cond = c_cond, mreg = mreg, yreg = yreg, interaction = interaction, 
##         casecontrol = casecontrol, eventvar = eventvar)

coef() for regmedint 

coef(regmedint)
## Error: object of type 'closure' is not subsettable
coef(regmedint, m_cde = 0, c_cond = 1)
## Error: object of type 'closure' is not subsettable
